phrases.usage: Use this phrase to acknowledge the receipt of the delivery while immediately introducing the specific issue encountered.
phrases.example: My order arrived, but the package was incomplete because two items were missing from the box.

phrases.usage: Use this phrase to provide the customer service agent with the unique identification code for your purchase.
phrases.example: The order number is A12345, so you can easily locate my transaction details in your system.

phrases.usage: Use this phrase to formally request that the company sends a new item to replace the missing or damaged one.
phrases.example: The product I received is defective, so could you send a replacement to my home address?

phrases.usage: Use this phrase to inquire about receiving your money back if you no longer want the replacement item.
phrases.example: I have already purchased the item elsewhere, so is a refund possible instead of a new shipment?

phrases.usage: Use this phrase to ask for a specific delivery date or timeline for the resolution of your issue.
phrases.example: You have processed the new request, so when will it arrive at my location?

phrases.text: What do you need from me?
phrases.usage: Use this phrase to ask what documentation or information is required to move forward with your claim.
phrases.example: I want to ensure all details are correct, so what do you need from me to finalize the return?

phrases.text: Just to confirm, the next step is...
phrases.usage: Use this phrase to verify the agreed-upon action plan and ensure there is no misunderstanding.
phrases.example: Just to confirm, the next step is that you will contact the courier because they lost the original package.

keyVocabulary.definition: A new item provided to take the place of one that is missing, lost, or damaged.
A sum of money that is paid back to a customer who is not satisfied with a product.
The instance of buying or selling something; a business deal.
A complete list of items such as property, goods in stock, or the contents of a building.
The action of solving a problem or finding a satisfactory way to deal with a disagreement.
